definition: contrary/in reverse/inside out or upside down/to reverse/to return/to oppose/opposite/against/anti-/to rebel/to use analogy/instead/abbr. for 反切[fan3 qie4] phonetic system
(of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb

sentences.english: We'll never compromise with the reactionary forces.
sentences.chinese: 我们决不向反动势力妥协。

sentences.english: His efforts were defeated by the forces of reaction .
sentences.chinese: 他的努力被反动势力挫败。

sentences.english: Provides reactionary force to the accelerator.
sentences.chinese: 提供了反动势力的加速器。

sentences.english: The insurgents are too weak to overthrow the newly emerging order.
sentences.chinese: 这些反动势力还未强大到可以推翻新政府。

sentences.english: The reactionary forces and we both have difficulties.
sentences.chinese: 反动势力面前和我们面前都有困难。

sentences.english: The forces of reaction made reform difficult.
sentences.chinese: 反动势力给改革造成了困难。

sentences.english: We must face down the forces of reaction.
sentences.chinese: 反动势力面前和我们面前都有困难。

sentences.english: The revolution was defeated by the forces of reaction.
sentences.chinese: 革命被反动势力扼杀了。

sentences.english: The Government of the Qing Dynasty collaborated with foreign reactionary forces to crush down the peasant uprising of the Taiping Heavenly Kingdom.
sentences.chinese: 清朝政府勾结外国反动势力镇压太平天国农民起义。

sentences.english: The parties of the leave have forme a common front to fight the force of reaction.
sentences.chinese: 政党的左翼组成与反动势力斗争的统一战线。

sentences.english: Right now, the progressive and status quo-ist forces should unite to defeat the regressive force.
sentences.chinese: 现在进步和中间平衡力量应该联合起来打败反动势力。

sentences.english: The force of reaction made change difficult.
sentences.chinese: 反动势力使得改革举步维艰。

definition: local bosses, shady gentry (idiom); dominant local mafia
Communist Party/abbr. for 共產黨|共产党[Gong4 chan3 dang3]
